title: Former Goalie Says U.S. Women's Soccer Team Looks 'Incredibly Strong'
teaser: The 2015 Women's World Cup opens in Canada Saturday. NPR's Melissa Block talks to former goalie Briana Scurry about the U.S. team's prospects. Scurry was on the last U.S. team that won in 1999.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
